description: Details of External/Internal Photographic Records of Coach House pursuant to condition 4 of planning permission P/2014/6378 dated 18/02/2015 for alterations to the coach house including, replacement of roof structure and renewal of roof coverings including the installation of two rooflights within the north roofslope and widening of existing vehicular entrance fronting The Park (Associated with proposed works to a Listed Building involving removal of cement renders and repointing using lime mortar; brickwork repairs and repointing; removal of tie rods; joinery repairs to coach doors, semi-circular window and east gable end window; reconfiguration of door opening to re-instate stable door; replacement of rainwater goods in cast iron) (Listed Building Consent)
